unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, wanna know if your Insta game is stronger than Dosa at CTR Central? Get ready, 'cause follower analytics are getting a major upgrade!
normalised: Hey folks, wanna know if your Insta game is stronger than Dosa at C T R Central? Get ready, 'cause follower analytics are getting a major upgrade!

unnormalised: Forget just likes, we're talking DEEP dives. Think: What time of day do most of your Chennai followers wake up for filter coffee? Which hashtags are REALLY working for your Delhi audience?
normalised: Forget just likes, we're talking deep dives. Think: What time of day do most of your Chennai followers wake up for filter coffee? Which hashtags are really working for your Delhi audience?

unnormalised: New tools let you see engagement rates based on region (Bihar's crushing it!), income level (Rs. 50,000+ crowd loves luxury travel apparently!), and even favourite Bollywood star (SRK still reigns supreme, obvi).
normalised: New tools let you see engagement rates based on region (Bihar's crushing it!), income level (rupees fifty thousand plus crowd loves luxury travel apparently!), and even favourite Bollywood star (S R K still reigns supreme, obvi).

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT Bombay is even developing an AI model that predicts follower growth based on your past samosa-related content. Mind. Blown.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I T Bombay is even developing an A I model that predicts follower growth based on your past samosa-related content. Mind. Blown.

unnormalised: Some influencers are already using this data to target ads more effectively. Imagine knowing your entire audience has a weakness for Mysore Pak! Cha-ching!
normalised: Some influencers are already using this data to target ads more effectively. Imagine knowing your entire audience has a weakness for Mysore Pak! Cha-ching!

unnormalised: Small business owners are loving it too. Raj from "Raj's Sarees" increased his online sales by 20% after discovering most of his followers live within a 5 km radius of his shop and prefer cotton saris. He is expanding his shop to a 1000 sq ft space now!
normalised: Small business owners are loving it too. Raj from "Raj's Sarees" increased his online sales by twenty percent after discovering most of his followers live within a five kilometer radius of his shop and prefer cotton saris. He is expanding his shop to a one thousand square feet space now!

unnormalised: So ditch the guesswork and get analyzing! Your pocket (and your brand) will thank you.
normalised: So ditch the guesswork and get analyzing! Your pocket (and your brand) will thank you.
